name: Symptom Tracker
desc: A project I created with my friends for a hackathon. Uses user input to map outbreaks across the Temple campus. I worked on the front-end.

name: Music Player
desc: A personal music player, similar to spotify, but using videos from YouTube. The primary way I listen to music, it can clip songs, speed them up or slow them down, and graphs songs by how much I've played them.

name: Bairs Bot
desc: A bot for a weekly Super Smash Brothers Tournament in the Philadelphia area. Uses graphql and tweepy to scrape the results of a tournament and post notable results.

name: Portfolio Projects
desc:
If you were wondering what the tabs right of the divider in the navbar was, they're projects integrated in this website! They showcase different skills I have and are pretty fun to mess around with.

You can go to their respective pages and click the 'What is this project?' tab for information!
